Arron.
Erika. What's up?
Another irresistible itch demanding a good scratching?
No. I mean, yes, but not exactly what you think.
Remember how you gave me your approval on Rose?
Uh-huh.
She's a tough nut to crack, so I could use your help.
I don't think ordering her around will work.
I beg you, I'll never going to force anyone like that.
What I need is a rare herb we elves often use for relaxation.
So can you help me get some of that?
I suppose. But is it safe for non-elves?
Of course it is. It's just rather hard to come by since elves cultivated it secretly.
Fine, you got my interest. So where are we going?
Oh, it's not far in the woods. I'll show the way.
